  • public class NotificationService
extends java.lang.Object
    Access user-specific notifications
    Author:
    Kevin Kelm (triggur@gmail.com)

      java.util.List<Notification> listMessageNotifications(boolean onlyNew)
      Returns the currently-logged-in user's list of message notifications
      java.util.List<Notification> listReplyNotifications(boolean onlyNew)

        public java.util.List<Notification> listReplyNotifications(boolean onlyNew)
                                                    throws BaringoApiException
        Specifically, returns only the notifications that someone has replied to the user in comments or somewhere.

        ACCESS: AUTHENTICATED USER

        Parameters:
        onlyNew - true if the request is for only the unviewed notifications
        Returns:
        A list of Notification objects
        Throws:
        BaringoApiException - something failed

                                throws BaringoApiException
        Marks a notification as having been viewed

        ACCESS: AUTHENTICATED USER

        Returns:
